item.title: www.vbuntu.org website went live!
item.description:
Vbuntu is Live!
It gives me immeanse pleasure to announce that, vbuntu.org is officially born on 22-Apr-2024! Let us bring the "bunt" in this community out! ...

item.title: Boot camp, is organized for the Students of BIT Engineering college.
item.description:
Boot Camp
Welcome to the “Vbuntu” Community!
We’re thrilled to have you here in a dynamic space dedicated to engineers ready to elevate their technical skills and build effective productivity systems. Whether you’re looking to build your coding expertise or enhance your design skills, dive into cutting-edge technologies, or develop habits that maximize your efficiency, you’re in the right place.
Our boot camp is designed to foster collaboration, hands-on learning, and personal growth. You’ll ...
